participant_1.background:
I used to wear a cape.
I love going to the movies.
It s one of my favorite hobbies.
My parents would take my brother and i when we were little.
We liked to pretend we were superheroes.

participant_2.background:
I am single and not looking.
My favorite hobby is reading suspense novels.
My mom is a cancer survivor.
My favorite subject in school was science.
Pizza is my favorite food.

content.text: What's your favorite hobby?
I love to read suspense novels.
That's cool! I used to love reading when I was a kid. I would read anything I could get my hands on.
Me too! I used to read so much that my parents would have to take away my books.
Haha, I know the feeling. I remember when I was in elementary school, I would read so much that I would fall asleep in class.
Oh no! I hope you didn't get in trouble.
I did once, but it was worth it.
I'm sure it was! So, what's your favorite suspense novel?
It's hard to say. I've read so many good ones. But I think I'd have to say The Girl on the Train by Paula Hawkins.
That's a great book! I loved it too.
Me too! It's so suspenseful and the plot twists are crazy.
Yeah, it was definitely a page-turner.
So, what's your favorite subject in school?
My favorite subject was science. I loved learning about the world around me.
Me too! I always loved science experiments.
Me too! I remember doing a science project in elementary school where I had to grow mold on bread.
Oh no! What happened?
It was disgusting! But it was also really cool.
I bet it was! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, read, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I like to do those things too.
Oh, cool! I'm glad we have so much in common.
